export-title-download.en: Choose a file format to download

export-subtitle-buy.en: Unlock this premium Journal Format to download without any limits

export_description_tex.en: Your formatted document as a LaTeX file

export_description_pdf.en: Your formatted document as a PDF

export_description_docx.en: Your formatted document as a Docx file

export_description_zip.en: Your LaTeX file, Docx file, PDF, Bibliography file and image directory compressed into a single Zip file.

export_word_warning.en: As a Basic plan user, you can download only up to 1000 words. Choose one of our paid plans to download the entire document

export_modal::premium_format_access.en: To download documents using Journal formats, you will need to be part of Advanced plan. Subscribe to download the document

export_count_warning.en: Only <available_count> exports remaining! To get access to unlimited downloads, upgrade to pro plan

export_count_error.en: You cannot export document anymore. To get access to unlimited downloads, upgrade to pro plan

export_format_expiring.en: <format-id> format is expiring in <days-left> days.Buy format for uninterrupted usage

export_format_expired.en: <format-id> format expired on <date>. Buy this format now for uninterrupted usage

export_format_purchase_success.en: Congratulations! You have just purchased <format-id>. Now you can download document in any type for free.

export_format_price.en: for 12 months. Pay now to download your Journal Compliant document, no limits.
